stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Environmental attributes
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Basic information of an environment ontology.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Environmental ontology
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Visualization for the structure of MEO (Metagenome/Microbes Environment Ontology).
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Geographical map
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Place where GOLD samples have sampled.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Inhabitants
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: List of samples and cultures which were sampled in specified environment.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Inhabitants statistics
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Number of samples and cultures which were sampled in specified environment.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Inhabitants statistics
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: NanoStanza for showing the number of organisms of a specified environment.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Growth pH distribution
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: NanoStanza for showing the number of organisms along with growth pH for the specified environmental feature.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Growth temperature distribution
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: NanoStanza for showing the number of Psychrophiles, Mesophiles and Thermophiles with the specified environmental feature.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Taxonomic composition
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Visualization of the kind of organism which lives in specified environment.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Environmental image
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: NanoStanza for showing an symbolic image for the MEO's toplevel category related to the given MEO ID.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Gene attributes
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Basic information of the specified gene.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Gene length
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: NanoStanza for showing gene length.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Geneset
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: A stanza for genesets.

stanza:parameter.stanza:description: A page uri of MicrobeBase GeneView

stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Geneset Entry
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: TODO: Write a stanza description.

stanza:parameter.stanza:description: A page uri of MicrobeBase GeneSetEntryView

stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Cross references
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Table of cross references of a given genome.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Genomic context
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Schematic view of the structure and surroundings of a gene.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Genomic information
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Genomic information of a taxonomy.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Genomic context
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Schematic view of the structure and surroundings of a gene.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Genomic plot
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Scatter plot of genomic information.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Taxonomic information
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Lineage of the specified organism.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Nucleotide sequence
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Nucleotide sequences of the specified gene ID.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Cross references
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: List of databases that references the specified organism.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Culture collections
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: List of strains that is related to the specified taxonomy. These strains are related to taxonomy by NCBI taxonomy database or by sequence or by StrainInfo database or by strain name.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: GC percent
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: NanoStanza for showing GC percent of specified organism.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Gene number
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: NanoStanza for showing the number of gene, rrna and trna of a specified organism.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Genome size
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: NanoStanza for showing the size of genome of a specified organism.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Organism habitat
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Link list of organism habitat.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Genomic context
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Schematic view of the genome of the specified organism.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Medium information
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Medium information of the specified organism.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Microbial cell shape
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Display an illustlation of the cell shape or arrangement of the specified organism.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Organism names
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: List of organism names and synonyms.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Pathogen information
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: List of organisms and associated pathogen which have linage of the specified taxonomy.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Growth pH
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Display growth pH of the specified organism.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Phenotype information
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Phenotype information of specified organism.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Disease pathogen
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: NanoStanza for showing a pathogen symbol.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Protein 3D structure
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: NanoStanza for showing a schematic mage of protein 3D structure of specifined genes.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Protein attributes
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: See also: http://www.uniprot.org/manual/?query=category%3Aprotein_attributes
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Protein cross references
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: See also: http://www.uniprot.org/manual/?query=category%3Across_references
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: EC number
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: NanoStanza for showing an schematic mage of protein 3D structure of specifined genes.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Protein general annotation
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: See also: http://www.uniprot.org/manual/?query=category%3Ageneral_annotation.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Protein names
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: See also: http://www.uniprot.org/manual/?query=category%3Anames_origin
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Protein ontologies
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: See also: http://www.uniprot.org/manual/?query=category%3Aontologies
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Protein orthologs
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Show members of an ortholog group.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Pfam plot
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Scatter plot of Pfam corresponding with genes.
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Protein references
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: See also: http://www.uniprot.org/manual/?query=category%3Areferences
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Reference timeline
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: NanoStanza for showing a timeline view of protein reference.

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Protein sequence
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: See also: http://www.uniprot.org/manual/?query=category%3Asequences
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: See also: http://www.uniprot.org/manual/?query=category%3Asequence_annotation
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Ortholog profile
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: Taxonomic profile of an ortholog group
stanza:stanzas.stanza:author: Stanza Togo

stanza:stanzas.stanza:label: Variation
stanza:stanzas.stanza:definition: A stanza for variations
